00018     int SyslogAppender::toSyslogPriority(int priority) {
00019         static int priorities[8] = { LOG_EMERG, LOG_ALERT, LOG_CRIT, LOG_ERR,
00020                                      LOG_WARNING, LOG_NOTICE, LOG_INFO, 
00021                                      LOG_DEBUG };
00022         int result;
00023 
00024         priority++;
00025         priority /= 100;
00026 
00027         if (priority < 0) {
00028             result = LOG_EMERG;
00029         } else if (priority > 7) {
00030             result = LOG_DEBUG;
00031         } else {
00032             result = priorities[priority];
00033         }
00034 
00035         return result;
00036     }

00061     void SyslogAppender::doAppend(const LoggingEvent& event) {
00062         if (!_layout) {
00063             // XXX help! help!

00066
